title: 2x MMR DAY
content:
Hey all, after talking to some faculty folk here we would like to test out what I call gambling day.

Throughout today all matches will be worth double points EDIT: we have made it so losses still deduct the same amount of points so fear not of losing double.

We are interested in seeing if this will promote activity or stunt it- so please share your thoughts and we will revert back to normal elo gain/loss in 12 hours.

title: 1000 member surprise and other updates
content:
Hello everyone! Small lil‚Äô update for everyone.

Firstly, thank you to everyone who participated in the 2x MMR day- we had a lot of participation and the technical side went off flawlessly. I will be including a poll in the near future to discuss a potential weekly +50% MMR day.

Lastly, as you may have read. We are rapidly approaching 1000 members and we would like all the help you guys can give to push us there as once at 1000 members we can apply for Discord Discovery. So as a little push and a thank you for everyone we will offer three potential events that you all will get to vote on- until we reach 1000 members the events will be hidden will be revealed once we reach our goal! 

Thank you everyone for helping make this server thrive! Looking forward to our future!

title: Double Random Tournament + World Cup Sign-Up!
content:
Hi all! Sorry for the delay- as the end of the S2 Master 1v1 Tournament is coming to an end- we would like to start taking submissions for the upcoming world cup and double random tournament.

As the World Cup is one of our largest events it is crucial to start preparing on our end immediately, overall, the World cup will follow the same group stage if necessary and will be First Come First Serve for the first 12 in each country (6 per team).

Any other questions feel free to ask Gussie or any staff-

Great things ahead and Bopl on,
Gussie

https://forms.gle/5Ktx1dMW9j7FR3uk8
https://forms.gle/wDZeZjCvm92ikPim7

title: Streaming Masters SEMI FINALS + 3rd PLACE
content:
Streaming Masters SEMI FINALS + 3rd PLACE

https://www.twitch.tv/gussie_luny

title: Quality of Life Update
content:
Hi all, tiny update here hence no ping. After ~60 votes the clear favorite is in. Starting World Cup we will limit ability bans to 1 per team.

It is also important to mention the Double Random Tournament will not have any bans or unbans as having 2 ability slots as random is already very limiting.

In addition, after prolonged discussion we will be reworking season 2 points to make them more equitable to all. This means the points for masters tournament will be declined whereas points for participating will be increased, all of this and a bit more to come!

Thanks all! Bopl On'
-Gussie

P.S We are still looking for a social media coordinator- so if you are interested please let me know

title: Tournament Elo
content:
Hello everybody! Excited to announce our partnership with Bopl Bros and @[150] Noah ! From now on every tournament we host and tournaments from other servers will be tracked and recorded for a universal rating! For those who have competed in the Double Random Tournament you can find your Elo below!

https://sites.google.com/view/boplbros/bopl-bros-ratings

We still will have our own elo just for our server- this is a universal system through multiple servers

title: WE BEGIN SOON
content:
As the final moments of the Double Random are coming to an end- I will be organizing the final teams and looking for last minute sign ups.

Start date: Monday, May 20th 2024

Please use this next day to confirm you are signed up and in your preferred country

If you have signed up recently please allow Gussie ~24 hours to update ‚Å†countries

Otherwise please contact Gussie or a Mod if something is wrong and we will be sure to answer your questions quickly!

Bopl on,
Gussie

title: Small QoL Update!
content:
Emoji's thank you @Zahirgamer444 and JustDave2 (isn't in server:boplSad: ) for the emoji's!

ELO System:
New names and quotas (thanks to @[512] [-‚àû] SB savaGe  for the help)
Below will be the new ranks and elo to reach them (can also be found @ ‚Å†üåê„Éªs3-info-and-sign-up ):

Newbie  - 0-99 ELO

Novice  - 100-199 ELO 

Intermediate  - 200-299 ELO

Advanced - 300-499 ELO

Expert  - 500-699 ELO

Supreme - 700-999 ELO

Boundless -  1000 - ‚àû ELO

With this system adjustment we will set base ELO win/loss for both doubles and singles @ 10 ELO!

Thank you to everyone who helps this server thrive through continued activity and as always let me or staff know if you have any problems!

Bopl on,
Gussie

(P.S. We are also testing with Low, Medium, and High ranked queues)
